thread.title: N.H.L. Roundup: Goalie Sets Lightning Record With Victory Over the Sabres
thread.title_full: N.H.L. Roundup: Goalie Sets Lightning Record With Victory Over the Sabres

title: N.H.L. Roundup: Goalie Sets Lightning Record With Victory Over the Sabres
text:
Published By: NYTimes Hockey - Yesterday 
Tampa Bay beat Buffalo, 2-1, as Lightning goalie Ben Bishop won his 84th game, breaking a tie with Nikolai Khabibulin....
